attributes.action: Mandatory planning for shooting incidents in schools
attributes.additional_details:
Following shootings such as in Norway, at Columbine High School in the USA, Beslan in Russia or at Dunblane where scores of children were shot by terrorists or troubled individuals, the UK should make it a legal requirement for all schools to plan for this type of event with the local police.

This will help train teachers how to to act and allow firearms police to respond quicker to a school shooting and save the lives of children.
